title: Sample Blanket, mid-20th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave, 3&1 twill, 7&1 satin
inscribed: typed card accompanying fabric,"11,840 warp threads in 50in."
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 314 x 129.5 cm (10 ft. 3 5/8 in. x 51 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
description: Length of fabric demonstrating three basic weave structures: plain weave, twill and satin. There is a change of weft threads from blue to yellow in each section.
